title: Gaiam Essentials Thick Yoga Mat Fitness & Exercise Mat with Easy-Cinch Yoga Mat Carrier Strap, 72"L x 24"W x 2/5 Inch Thick; color: teal
descriptions:
Introducing the Gaiam Essentials Thick Yoga Mat Fitness & Exercise Mat with Easy-Cinch Yoga Mat Carrier Strap in a stunning teal color! This yoga mat is designed to elevate your practice and enhance your overall fitness experience.

With dimensions of 72"L x 24"W x 2/5 Inch Thick, this mat provides ample space for you to stretch, twist, and flow with ease. The extra-thick design offers superior cushioning, ensuring maximum comfort and support during your workouts. Made from high-quality NBR foam, this mat is not only durable but also soft to the touch, providing a luxurious feel for your hands and feet.

Suitable for various exercises including yoga, Pilates, and floor exercises, this versatile mat is perfect for both beginners and experienced practitioners. The soft cushioning allows for joint protection, making it ideal for individuals with sensitive knees or wrists. Say goodbye to discomfort and hello to a more enjoyable workout!

But that's not all – this yoga mat comes with an easy-cinch yoga mat carrier strap, allowing you to conveniently transport and store your mat wherever you go. No more struggling with bulky bags or tangled straps. Simply roll up your mat, secure it with the carrier strap, and you're ready to hit the gym, studio, or even the park.

Weighing just 3.11 pounds, this lightweight mat is easy to carry and travel-friendly. Whether you're practicing at home, attending a class, or exploring the great outdoors, the Gaiam Essentials Thick Yoga Mat Fitness & Exercise Mat will be your trusty companion.

So why wait? Elevate your practice and take your fitness journey to new heights with the Gaiam Essentials Thick Yoga Mat Fitness & Exercise Mat with Easy-Cinch Yoga Mat Carrier Strap. Experience the ultimate comfort, support, and convenience in one stylish teal package. Get yours today and discover a new level of wellness.
